Make the History and brake the world record for typing speed

Thank you for downloading
Keybee Keyboard.

Please select your layout:
Enable Keybee Keyboard and\nset as default keyboard
Awesome, Keybee Keyboard is enabled. Now please select a theme:
With Keybee Keyboard you can twipe:\ntap and swipe over adjacent letters
Enjoy the new way of typing.\nFor free. Forever.
We want to create the fastest, the most accurate and comfortable touchscreen keyboard in the World

We live in a World where the keyboard is the most used mobile application, but we type with a layout which belongs to something else.

In 1863 Christopher Sholes wanted to fix the jams on typewriters. So he moved to the opposite the most frequent letters and letter-pairs to improve typing with both hands. The qwerty keyboard was invented.

The success of qwerty was so huge that the same layout is still used today as input device on computer keyboard.

In 2007 the mobile world became touch friendly. Smartphones became our daily pocket computer and the touchscreen was introduced to use the phone with one hand.

But typing on a physical keyboard and on a touchscreen is not the same: 
1 - different number of fingers necessary to type: ten vs one 
2 - different gestures: no-swipe vs swipe So sharing the same qwerty layout is not efficient.

This incompatibility created an usability problem because the device was adapted to the keyboard. How? 
1 - Less space: limited key size and useless gap between keys 
2 - Low speed: no swipe friendly, slow typing because floating fingers through the borders 
3 - Less comfort: no ergonomics and uncomfortable typing, we are forced to type with two hands or switch the phone to landscape. 

To fix this problem we adapted the keyboard to the device. How? 
1 - we optimized the space by using an hexagonal structure the most efficient structure in Nature, which increases the key size in the same device area up to 50% 
2 - we increased the typing speed up to 50% by making more swipe friendly connections between letters and letter-pairs and by removing the gaps between keys 
3 - we improved ergonomics by arranging the layout around the center of the screen to type easily with just one finger. No need for two hands for typing.

Discover the new way of typing. For free. Forever.

The Qwerty on touchscreen is like using a steering wheel on a bicycle: just because I can turn it doesn’t mean that the controller should be like this. A bicycle needs a controller designed for it: the handlebar. A touchscreen needs a keyboard designed for it: Keybee Keyboard. 

I want to give Keybee Keybee for free because the keyboard is the basic human - device interaction and because it is universal. It involves all People in the World, no matter the age they have, the language they speak or the place they live. And all the greatest tech innovations are free. 

I would like to thank all the Keybee Keyboard users who gave me the strength to continue this project even without external investments through their messages, reviews, previous subscriptions and purchases.

From 2025 Keybee Keyboard became full free, ads free and Open Source with the permissive license Apache 2.0. I hope that the dev Community can make this project awesome and together we can reach the visibility that Keybee Keyboard deserves. I mean, we don’t have to go to Mars with the qwerty layout, right?

Marco Papalia.
Amazing! Keybee Keyboard notifications are now synced with your device notification
Hold the space key to move the cursor
Add a language to the dictionary
"The Keybee Keyboard text suggestion works only with your native Google or Android Spell Checker. Please enable it in \"Language & input\" settings to use with Keybee."
Tap on the theme to see and use your favourite one.

Tap on the theme to see, use or buy your favourite one. A theme costs only 1€ like a coffee in Italy.\n\nIf you have purchased a theme from a different device, please reinstall Keybee Keyboard to sync and use your purchased themes.

To customize the layout fill the column on the right with the desired letter. \n\nTo customize the pop-up press the underlined letter on the left column and then reorder the special letters with the up and down arrows as you like.

To customize the layout fill the column on the right with the desired letter. 

Custom layout is available only with Keybee subscription. 

To customize the pop-up press the underlined letter on the left column and then reorder the special letters with the up and down arrows as you like. 

Custom pop-up is available fore free without Keybee subscription.
Welcome to the Keybee Keyboard themes!
Free access to all themes and custom layout
Tap to sync new devices with our push notifications

With Keybee Keyboard subscription: 

You will get free access to all the current and future Keybee Keyboard themes. You can use or switch theme whenever you like without paying theme individually. 

You can customise the selected layout by moving all the letters around the main keyboard. 

You will help to improve the quality of the key bee project with new features, new layouts, new themes and more frequent updates.so if you also want support us, this subscription os the best way to make Keybee Keyboard better. 

Important note: you can view the status of your subscription and cancel it if necessary from the My Apps Screen in the Play Store app. 


Thank You!
